Text: E̩wñ chi ku me̩ kʼo̩ko̩ ala e̩wñ ki ma chʼuje̩wñ n?
Hi eti-we̩ wane̩, kʼe̩ wʼugbo mi;
Go, omi mʼowñ du chʼe̩nibenu ñw amone̩ amone̩,
Go, uwe̩ adʼo̩ abo ichiʼka kʼe̩ ma ma ma n,
Me̩ tejane̩ Jihofa abu kʼi dʼugbo kʼame̩ ali,
Todu ibe ki dʼefu-mi chʼojoji ñw ibe ki dʼefu e-me̩,
Todu alu kʼefojale efojale jʼatate̩ ñw ile̩-i,
Todu alu kʼomi alo̩ kwʼojale wʼane̩, kpai alu ki sno agwo̩ru kwʼojale wa,
alu le̩ o̩la ki akwef alu-mi dufu ade̩ ge̩;
